item.title: Fly tipping ., 12th February
item.description:
Reported mattress over a week ago. I t is still there Could you please fix this problem.! Mattress still outside shop on corner of Ceres Road and Bannockburn Road. Clothing has been dumped in front and around mattress and small table added.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bannockburn Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole on mini roundabout, 12th February
item.description:
Huge pothole has appeared on the mini roundabout. Started as a small dip but now cannot drive over it safely. Trying to turn in or out of Bickley Park Road is horrendous. People are trying to avoid so swerving in front of other cars going round the roundabout so is becoming very dangerous. Going to cause damage to cars as well due to the very uneven and bumpy road surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Park Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
